Producer: Tony Vidal, Gregory Wilker, R. Ellis Frazier, Justin Nesbitt
Synopsis: Straight-laced Bryan agrees to drive his parents' luxury RV to Cabo, Mexico, for Christmas break. Misadventures ensue when Bryan's wild friend Todd talks him into bringing along two girls for the ride. The trouble starts when Todd makes a deal with a top gangster to transport a shipment of contraband cellphones. When rivals steal the phones, the quartet seek refuge at a remote, decaying resort. When the RV is taken, they must come up with a plan to raise the money needed to get out of trouble.
Title: Baja
